Articles.Content:
I want two of the fairings.

Here the link to the image http://www.directupload.net/file/d/4416/m265jij8_png.htm

Can someone help me?

It's not a bug.  Press 'X' to change your symmetry mode.  It cycles through one, two, three, four, six, eight, and back to one again.  You can see the indicator for this on the bottom left of your screen; it's the one with a single dot in the centre.
